meanings.definition: A unit of capacity equal to one thousandth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I poured two milliliters of water into the cup.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for fifty milliliters of milk.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten drank only a few milliliters of milk before falling asleep.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was immeasurable, like a million milliliters of affection.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully measured the exact number of milliliters needed for the experiment.

meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one cubic centimeter.
meanings.sent1: The medicine dropper dispensed five milliliters of liquid.
meanings.sent2: The small bottle contained ten milliliters of perfume.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fish tank held only a few milliliters of water.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed in the room, filling every milliliter of space.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed the colors in precise milliliters to create the perfect shade.
